title: SolviroStudio extra-long portfolio website (Meta Ads + Creative Design for solar companies)

requirements.text: Build a single-page, extra-long scrolling portfolio website for “SolviroStudio” with a top navigation menu linking to in-page sections: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us.

quotes: Navigation menu: Home / Portfolio / About Us / Services / Client Results / Testimonials / Contact Us
Scroll length: extra long, covering all above sections for strong client trust

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation is visible and includes exactly: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us.
Clicking a nav item scrolls to the corresponding section on the same page (anchor/scroll behavior).
Page scroll length is clearly “extra long” with all requested sections and substantial vertical spacing/content.

requirements.text: Implement the site-wide visual system using the brand colors #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 for buttons, accents, and highlights, including a consistent gradient treatment (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) and a modern, clean, professional layout suitable for a results-focused solar marketing agency.

quotes: Colors to use: #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 (for buttons, accents, and highlights)

Design Instructions:

Modern, clean, and professional layout

Highlight buttons, icons, and accents with gradient colors (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00)

Ensure the website feels trustworthy, problem-solving, and results-focused, especially for solar companies

acceptanceCriteria: Primary buttons and key accents use the specified brand colors and/or the specified gradient.
The gradient (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) is used consistently for highlights (e.g., CTAs, section dividers, icon fills, badges) without introducing additional competing primary brand colors.
Overall layout is modern/clean with clear hierarchy, readable typography, and trustworthy visual presentation.

requirements.text: Create the Home (Hero) section with the exact headline, subheadline, CTA button text, and a professional gradient background using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.

quotes:
Homepage (Hero Section):

Headline: “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”

Subheadline: “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”

Call-to-action button: “Get Started Now”

Background: professional gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline matches exactly: “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”.
Hero subheadline matches exactly: “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”
Hero contains a primary CTA button labeled exactly “Get Started Now”.
Hero background is a gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.

requirements.text: Create the About SolviroStudio section with the provided text, include an optional visual (image/illustration), and include a CTA button labeled “Learn More”.

quotes:
About SolviroStudio Section:

Text: “At SolviroStudio, we specialize in Meta Ads and Creative Design to help solar companies overcome marketing challenges and achieve measurable growth.”

Include optional image or team illustration

Call-to-action button: “Learn More”

acceptanceCriteria: About section contains the exact provided paragraph.
About section includes a visual area rendering the provided/generated team illustration asset (or a placeholder if assets are not yet present).
About section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Learn More”.

requirements.text: Create the Services section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions each: (1) Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies, (2) Creative Design & Visual Campaigns, (3) ROI-Focused Lead Generation; include a CTA button labeled “Explore Services”.

quotes:
Services Section:

Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies

Creative Design & Visual Campaigns

ROI-Focused Lead Generation

Each service has 1–2 sentence description

Call-to-action button: “Explore Services”

acceptanceCriteria: Services section displays the three service titles exactly as specified.
Each service includes a 1–2 sentence description in English focused on solar-company outcomes (leads/engagement/ROI).
Services section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Explore Services”.

requirements.text: Create the Portfolio section showcasing 5–7 projects with visuals; each project block must include an Ad Design Image, a Campaign Goal (e.g., generate solar leads), and Results achieved (leads, engagement, ROI metrics); include a CTA button labeled “View Full Portfolio”.

quotes:
Portfolio Section:

Showcase 5–7 projects with visuals

Each project block includes:

Ad Design Image

Campaign Goal (example: generate solar leads)

Results achieved (leads, engagement, ROI metrics)

Call-to-action button: “View Full Portfolio”

acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio section renders between 5 and 7 project cards/blocks.
Each project card includes: (1) an image, (2) campaign goal text, (3) a results/metrics area including leads and at least one of engagement/ROI.
Portfolio section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “View Full Portfolio”.

requirements.text: Create a Client Results section designed to hold multiple screenshots/graphics of real campaign results, including the provided intro text and a CTA button labeled “Get Your Results”.

quotes:
Client Results Section:

Dedicated section for screenshots or graphics showing real campaign results

Text: “We deliver measurable results for solar companies. Here’s what our clients achieved with SolviroStudio:”

Include space for multiple result images or charts

Call-to-action button: “Get Your Results”

acceptanceCriteria: Client Results section includes the exact provided text.
Client Results section includes a responsive layout area that can display multiple images/charts (e.g., a grid/carousel).
Client Results section includes a CTA button labeled exactly “Get Your Results”.

requirements.text: Create the Testimonials section with 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses, including the provided supporting text.

quotes:
Testimonials Section:

Include 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses

Text: “Our clients love the results we deliver – from creative campaigns to lead generation.”

acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section includes between 3 and 5 testimonial quote blocks.
Testimonials section includes the exact provided text: “Our clients love the results we deliver – from creative campaigns to lead generation.”
Testimonials content is in English and clearly relevant to solar-company Meta Ads + creative outcomes.

requirements.text: Create the Contact Us section with the provided text, display the email “solvirostudio@gmail.com”, display a phone placeholder, and provide a simple contact form with a CTA button labeled “Contact Me”.

quotes:
Contact Us Section:

Text: “Ready to solve your solar business marketing challenges and see measurable results? Contact SolviroStudio today!”

Include:

Email: solvirostudio@gmail.com

Phone placeholder

Simple contact form

Call-to-action button: “Contact Me”

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section includes the exact provided paragraph.
Email address is displayed exactly as: solvirostudio@gmail.com.
A phone placeholder is displayed (no real number required).
A simple contact form is present (e.g., name, email, company, message) with a submit button labeled exactly “Contact Me”.
On submit, the UI shows a clear success/failure state without requiring any third-party email service.

requirements.text: Implement backend support to store contact form submissions in the Motoko canister (single-actor), including a query method to list submissions for administrative review (no public UI required unless minimal view is necessary).
acceptanceCriteria: Contact submissions are persisted in canister state (survive page reloads and subsequent queries).
Backend exposes an update method to create a submission and a query method to retrieve submissions.
No external databases or third-party integrations are required for submission storage.

requirements.text: Ensure every major section (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact) contains a prominent call-to-action button as specified, and those CTAs provide sensible navigation (e.g., scroll to Contact/Services/Portfolio) consistent with a lead-generation flow.

quotes: Buttons should appear on every major section for easy navigation

acceptanceCriteria: Each major section includes a visible CTA button (matching the specified label where provided).
Clicking each CTA performs a meaningful action (e.g., scrolls to another section such as Contact, Services, or Portfolio).
CTA styling is consistent across sections and uses the brand gradient/accent colors.

requirements.text: Add static asset support for the requested visuals (team illustration, portfolio ad designs, client results graphics/charts) and render them in the appropriate sections from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).

quotes: Include optional image or team illustration
Dedicated section for screenshots or graphics showing real campaign results

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
About section renders the team illustration asset.
Portfolio project cards render the ad design images.
Client Results section renders multiple result graphics/charts assets.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Use only the brand colors #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 for buttons, accents, and highlights, and use the gradient #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00 prominently.
Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not use third-party email/SMS services; contact form handling must work without external integrations.
nonGoals: Building multi-page routing with separate URLs for each nav item (single-page scrolling is sufficient).
Integrating third-party analytics, Meta Ads APIs, CRMs, or email delivery providers.
Real-time chat, push notifications, or WebSocket-based features.
